objects.name: Analytic 0837
objects.description: ESXi hypervisor permission modification behavioral chain: (1) SSH access to ESXi host, (2) chmod/chown execution on VMFS datastore files or system configuration, (3) Modification of VM configuration files (.vmx) or virtual disk permissions, (4) Hostd service log correlation, (5) vCenter permission change events if centrally managed

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: esxi:shell
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: shell command execution for chmod, chown, or file permission modification on VMFS or system files

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: esxi:hostd
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: host daemon events related to file or VM permission changes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: esxi:vpxd
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: permission change operations on datastores or VMs

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: ESXi user accounts authorized for shell access and file system operations
VMFS datastore paths requiring permission change monitoring
Time correlation window for linking SSH access with permission modifications
Scope of vCenter audit event correlation with ESXi host activities
